products.name: Silver Hammer Shiraz 2022
products.description: Rich fruits, smooth with savoury spice. Great value Shiraz for every day.
products.tasting_notes: Fragrant aromas of florals and plum. Palate shows fruit intensity, savoury spices and fine tannins. Mouth filling, great length. Full bodied, but restrained.

products.name: Nero d'Avola 2023
products.description: Vibrant, soft with juicy acidity, savoury. The ultimate pizza wine.
products.tasting_notes: Vibrant red wine with soft tannins and juicy acidity, featuring savoury characteristics that make it an ideal pairing with pizza and Italian cuisine.

products.name: Ellen Street Shiraz 2022
products.description: Aromatic spice, rich dark fruits, length and intensity. Quintessential McLaren Vale Shiraz.
products.tasting_notes: Aromatic nose with spice notes, rich dark fruit flavors, excellent length and intensity. A classic representation of McLaren Vale Shiraz.

products.name: Fiano 2025
products.description: Zesty, textured, complex. One of Italy's oldest varieties, a newfound favourite in McLaren Vale.
products.tasting_notes: Zesty and textured with complex flavor profile. This ancient Italian variety thrives in McLaren Vale, offering a refreshing and sophisticated white wine experience.

products.name: Grenache Rose 2024
products.description: Fresh, vibrant, textured. Inspired by the great dry style Roses of Provence.
products.tasting_notes: Fresh and vibrant with excellent texture, inspired by the dry style rosés of Provence. A sophisticated and refreshing rosé wine.

products.name: Spiced Mead 750ml
products.description: Heady spice, complex, satisfying. A winter favourite, served warm.
products.tasting_notes: Heady spice with complex flavors that create a satisfying experience. Perfect as a winter warmer, best served warm.

products.name: Honey Mead 750ml
products.description: Floral and deliciously sweet. The original mead, Australia's favourite since 1966.
products.tasting_notes: Floral aromas with deliciously sweet honey flavors. The original Maxwell mead that has been Australia's favorite since 1966.

products.name: Liqueur Mead 375ml
products.description: Fortified, spiced, delicious. Aged in bourbon casks. Dessert in a glass.
products.tasting_notes: Fortified and spiced mead aged in bourbon casks, offering a rich, dessert-like experience in a glass.

products.name: Little Demon Envious Sparkling NV
products.description: Bright, fresh, easy-drinking. Made for celebrations, enjoy it now. What are you waiting for?
products.tasting_notes: Bright and fresh with easy-drinking appeal. Perfect for celebrations and ready to enjoy now.

products.name: Sparkling Mead 4 pack x 330ml
products.description: Contemporary, refreshing, sessionable. Ideal for everyday summer drinking.
products.tasting_notes: Contemporary and refreshing sparkling mead in convenient cans. Sessionable and ideal for everyday summer drinking.

products.name: Lime Cave Cabernet Sauvignon 2022
products.description: Concentrated, generous, delicious. Epitome of McLaren Vale Cabernet, drink now or cellar.
products.tasting_notes: Concentrated and generous with delicious flavors. The epitome of McLaren Vale Cabernet Sauvignon, suitable for drinking now or cellaring.

products.name: Fresca Grenache 2024
products.description: Bright, delicious, unique. An early, easy drinking style that can be enjoyed chilled (or not).
products.tasting_notes: Bright and delicious with unique characteristics. An early-drinking style that can be enjoyed chilled or at room temperature.

products.name: Eocene 'Ancient Earth' Shiraz 2023
products.description: Layered, complex, savoury. Single Vineyard Shiraz showcasing terroir of Maxwell estate.
products.tasting_notes: Layered and complex with savoury characteristics. A single vineyard Shiraz that showcases the unique terroir of the Maxwell estate.

products.name: Verdelho 2024
products.description: Fresh, tropical, soft and textured. Sheer drinkability, a great match with spicier dishes.
products.tasting_notes: Fresh and tropical with soft, textured palate. Highly drinkable and pairs excellently with spicy dishes.

products.name: Sparkling Mead 24 pack x 330ml
products.description: Contemporary, refreshing, sessionable. Ideal for everyday summer drinking.
products.tasting_notes: Contemporary and refreshing sparkling mead in convenient cans. Sessionable and ideal for everyday summer drinking.

products.name: Four Roads Grenache 2023
products.description: Red fruits balanced with earthy spice. Uniquely McLaren Vale Grenache.
products.tasting_notes: Red fruit flavors balanced with earthy spice. A uniquely McLaren Vale expression of Grenache.

products.name: Clan Exclusive Malbec 2024
products.description: Aromatic and juicy, intense mixed spice. Clan wine club exclusive.
products.tasting_notes: Aromatic and juicy with intense mixed spice characteristics. An exclusive offering for Clan wine club members.

products.name: Tiers of Wisdom Grenache 2024
products.description: Perfumed. Crushed raspberries, bramble, violet florals, hints of pepper.
products.tasting_notes: Perfumed with aromas and flavors of crushed raspberries, bramble, violet florals, and hints of pepper.

products.name: Cabernet Franc 2024
products.description: Light, lively and fresh. A versatile food-friendly wine.
products.tasting_notes: Light and lively with fresh characteristics. A versatile, food-friendly wine suitable for many occasions.

products.name: Minotaur Reserve Shiraz 2023
products.description: Powerful, complex, captivating. A selection of the very best barrels from the Minotaur vineyard.
products.tasting_notes: Powerful and complex with captivating characteristics. A premium selection of the very best barrels from the Minotaur vineyard.

products.name: GSM 2023
products.description: Fresh, modern, bright with subtle spice. A lovely blend of Grenache, Shiraz, and Mataro.
products.tasting_notes: Fresh and modern with bright fruit and subtle spice. A lovely blend of Grenache, Shiraz, and Mataro that showcases the best of each variety.

products.name: Chardonnay 2024
products.description: Nashi pear, creamy and subtle toasty oak. Cool climate Chardonnay from the Adelaide Hills.
products.tasting_notes: Nashi pear flavors with creamy texture and subtle toasty oak. A cool climate Chardonnay from the Adelaide Hills.

products.name: Grenache Blanc 2025
products.description: Textured, bright with saline minerality. A refreshing, complex white wine perfect with seafood.
products.tasting_notes: Textured and bright with saline minerality. A refreshing and complex white wine that pairs perfectly with seafood.

products.name: Silver Hammer Shiraz 2022 Magnum
products.description: Rich fruits, smooth with savoury spice. Great value Shiraz for every day.
products.tasting_notes: Fragrant aromas of florals and plum. Palate shows fruit intensity, savoury spices and fine tannins. Mouth filling, great length. Full bodied, but restrained.

products.name: The Orchard Cabernet Sauvignon 2023
products.description: Smooth, subtle, hints of chocolate. A Classic Cabernet for any occasion.
products.tasting_notes: Smooth and subtle with hints of chocolate. A classic Cabernet Sauvignon suitable for any occasion.

products.name: Dining Gift Card
products.description: Gift card for dining at Maxwell Wines restaurant.
products.tasting_notes: N/A

products.tasting_notes: Layered and complex with savoury characteristics. A single vineyard Shiraz that showcases the unique terroir of the Maxwell estate.

products.name: Fortified White
products.description: Premium fortified white wine.
products.tasting_notes: A premium fortified white wine with complex characteristics.

products.name: Late Bottle Vintage Port
products.description: Rich and complex late bottle vintage port.
products.tasting_notes: Rich and complex fortified wine in the port style, with deep flavors and excellent aging potential.

products.description: Exclusively available to members.
products.tasting_notes: Premium Shiraz available exclusively to wine club members in a dozen pack format.

products.name: Old + Rare Tawny
products.description: Aged tawny with complex oxidative characteristics.
products.tasting_notes: Old and rare tawny with complex oxidative characteristics developed through extended aging.

products.name: Cleanskin Dozen | Sparkling Shiraz NV
products.description: Exclusively available to members.
products.tasting_notes: Sparkling Shiraz available exclusively to wine club members in a dozen pack format.

products.description: Exclusively available to members.
products.tasting_notes: Tempranillo available exclusively to wine club members in a dozen pack format.

products.description: Exclusively available to members.

metadata.notes: Prices are estimates based on similar products. Wine club prices typically offer 20% discount. Product images are placeholder URLs and should be verified. Some products are exclusive to wine club members.
